name: cryptocurrencytracker
description: This is the **main orchestrator module** for the Cryptocurrency Portfolio Tracker project. It pulls together two core submodules:

scripts.install: cd CryptocurrencyTrackerWeb && npm install && cd .. && cd CryptocurrencyTrackerAPI && npm install
scripts.build:images:dev: cd CryptocurrencyTrackerWeb && npm run build:image && cd .. && cd CryptocurrencyTrackerAPI && npm run build:image:dev
